mode.title: Detection Mode
mode.desc:
Choose the algorithm used to find blobs.
• Grayscale: Brightness based.
• Edges: Contours/Outline based.
• Color: Specific color range.

threshold.title: Brightness Threshold
threshold.desc: Pixels brighter than this value are considered blobs. Lower values pick up darker objects.

canny_low.title: Identify Weak Edges
canny_low.desc: Lower bound for edge detection. Lines below this contrast intensity are discarded.

canny_high.title: Identify Strong Edges
canny_high.desc: Upper bound for edge detection. Lines above this contrast are definitely edges.

target_color.title: Target Color
target_color.desc: Click to pick the specific color you want to track.

tolerance.title: Color Tolerance
tolerance.desc: How much variation from the target color is allowed. Higher values match a broader range of shades.

blur.title: Blur Amount
blur.desc: Softens the image before detection. Reduces noise and jagged edges.

dilation.title: Dilation
dilation.desc: Expands the white regions of detected blobs. Useful for joining broken parts of an object.

min_area.title: Minimum Area
min_area.desc: Smallest allowed blob size (in pixels). Helps ignore small noise.

max_area.title: Maximum Area
max_area.desc: Largest allowed blob size. Helps ignore full-screen glitches or backgrounds.

shape_style.title: Shape Style
shape_style.desc: The geometric shape drawn for each tracked blob.

max_blobs.title: Max Blob Count
max_blobs.desc: Limit the number of objects tracked simultaneously to keep performance high.

border_thickness.title: Border Thickness
border_thickness.desc: Thickness of the shape outline in pixels.

fill_shape.title: Fill Shape
fill_shape.desc: Toggle to fill the inside of the shapes with color.

fill_opacity.title: Fill Opacity
fill_opacity.desc: Transparency of the shape fill. 0 is invisible, 100 is solid.

show_dot.title: Show Center Dot
show_dot.desc: Draws a small red dot at the precise center of the tracked object.

fixed_size.title: Fixed Size
fixed_size.desc: Force all shapes to have the same size, ignoring the actual blob size.

fixed_size_val.title: Size Value
fixed_size_val.desc: The pixel size for Fixed Size mode.

show_traces.title: Show Traces
show_traces.desc: Draws a trail following the movement of blobs.

trace_thickness.title: Trace Thickness
trace_thickness.desc: Width of the movement trail lines.

trace_lifetime.title: Trace Lifetime
trace_lifetime.desc: How long (in frames) the trail remains visible.

mode.title: Color Mode
mode.desc:
Determines how shapes are colored.
• Solid: Single static color.
• Effect: Dynamic patterns (Rainbow, etc).
• Custom: Fine-tuned effects.

solid_color.title: Reference Color
solid_color.desc: The solid color used for all shapes.

speed.title: Effect Speed
speed.desc: How fast the colors cycle or animate.

intensity.title: Effect Intensity
intensity.desc: Strength or saturation of the effect.

primary_color.title: Base Color
primary_color.desc: The starting or main color for effects like 'Breathe'.

mode.title: Text Mode
mode.desc:
What text to display next to blobs.
• Index: 1, 2, 3...
• Random Word: Generates cool sci-fi words.

position.title: Text Position
position.desc: Where the text appears relative to the blob.

size.title: Font Size
size.desc: Size of the text in points.
